Name: Righteous Conviction
Story Background: In a time of great peril, the armies of light stood firm, emboldened by their unyielding faith.
Ability: Choose a creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink.
Appearance Description: The artwork depicts a radiant aura surrounding a valiant warrior, their weapon aglow with divine energy, as they lead the charge against a horde of shadowy figures.
